name: Takoyaki
description:
A Roguelite about making Takoyaki!

Goes up to floor 11

Made in a week for the College Game Jam

by Weekend

Developed in Godot 3.2

Sprites drawn in Aseprite

Music made in LMMS

Sound effects made in BFXR

Some sound effects sourced from https://picturetosound.com/en and https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/ocean/
